author: arunhep
body:
This PR updates the data and mc global tags with the GEM electronics map.
offline data GTs now also contain latest 2017 rereco conditions.

# Summary of changes in Global Tags 
 
## RunI data 
 
   * **RunI HLT processing** : [100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2) as [100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * change of tag for the SiPixel templates for 0T

   * **RunI Offline processing** : [100X_dataRun2_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_v3) as [100X_dataRun2_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_v3/100X_dataRun2_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * update of 2017 rereco conditions

## RunII data 
 
   * **RunII HLTHI processing** : [100X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v2) as [100X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v2/100X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * change of tag for the SiPixel templates for 0T

   * **RunII HLT relval processing** : [100X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v2) as [100X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v2/100X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * change of tag for the SiPixel templates for 0T

   * **RunII Offline processing** : [100X_dataRun2_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_v3) as [100X_dataRun2_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_v3/100X_dataRun2_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * update of 2017 rereco conditions

   * **RunII Offline relval processing** : [100X_dataRun2_relval_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_relval_v3) as [100X_dataRun2_relval_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_relval_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_relval_v3/100X_dataRun2_relval_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * update of 2017 rereco conditions

   * **RunII Prompt processing** : [100X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v2) as [100X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v2/100X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * change of tag for the SiPixel templates for 0T

   * **RunI HLT processing** : [100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2) as [100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v2/100X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * change of SiPixel templates 0T tag

## Upgrade 
 
   * **PhaseII realistic scenario** : [100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v2) as [100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v2/100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v1): 
      * update of GEM electronics map

   * **PhaseI 2018 cosmics scenario** : [100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v10](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v10) as [100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v9) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v10/100X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v9): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * update of ZeroMaterial SIM geometry

   * **PhaseI 2018 design scenario** : [100X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v8) as [100X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v7) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v8/100X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v7): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * update of ZeroMaterial SIM geometry

   * **PhaseI 2018 realistic scenario** : [100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v12](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v12) as [100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v11](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v11) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v12/100X_upgrade2018_realistic_v11): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
      * update of ZeroMaterial SIM geometry

   * **PostLS2 design scenario** : [100X_postLS2_design_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_postLS2_design_v3) as [100X_postLS2_design_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_postLS2_design_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_postLS2_design_v3/100X_postLS2_design_v2): 
      * update of Jet probability b tagging calibrations
      * update of GEM electronics map

   * **PostLS2 realistic scenario** : [100X_postLS2_realistic_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_postLS2_realistic_v3) as [100X_postLS2_realistic_v2](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_postLS2_realistic_v2) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_postLS2_realistic_v3/100X_postLS2_realistic_v2): 
      * update of Jet probability b tagging calibrations
      * update of GEM electronics map

## 2017_MC 
 
   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics peak scenario** : [100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v4) as [100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v4/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v3): 
      * update of GEM electronics map

   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics scenario** : [100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v4) as [100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v4/100X_mc2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v3): 
      * update of GEM electronics map

   * **PhaseI 2017 design scenario** : [100X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v4) as [100X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v4/100X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v3): 
      * update of GEM electronics map

   * **PhaseI 2017 realistic scenario** : [100X_mc2017_realistic_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017_realistic_v4) as [100X_mc2017_realistic_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017_realistic_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_mc2017_realistic_v4/100X_mc2017_realistic_v3): 
      * update of GEM electronics map
title: All data and MC GTs updated with GEM electronics map
